plot: 28-year-old Kansas University doctoral student Omar Razaghi wins a grant to write a biography of Latin American writer Jules Gund. Omar must get through to three people who were close to Gund--his brother, widow, and younger mistress--so he can get authorization to write the biography.   Written by  Marisa_Gabriella, edited by Krystal Frauendienst
title: The City of Your Final Destination
